Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.cli

Class UIPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.cli.UIPlayer
public class UIPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
Class containing all the details that are useful client-side to display a player, in addition to their workers. Each player has a unique number (it MAY differ on different clients). Each player has a unique color (it MAY differ on different clients).

  • Constructor Details

    • UIPlayer

      public UIPlayer​(java.lang.String username, int number, UIColor color)
      Construct a player object.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player (retrieved from the user or the server).
      number - a unique number to distinguish the player
      color - a unique UIColor to highlight the player's belongings.

  • Method Details

    • getUsername

      public java.lang.String getUsername()
      Retrieve a player's username
      Returns:
      the player username

    • getColor

      public UIColor getColor()
      Retrieve the color assigned to this player
      Returns:
      the color (it may need a cast to the correct implementation)

    • getNumber

      public int getNumber()
      Retrieve the player unique number
      Returns:
      the number

    • setGod

      public void setGod​(java.lang.String id)
      Set a player god. If a god is not found, it will be null!
      Parameters:
      id - the name retrieved from the server corresponding to this god.

    • getGod

      public UIGod getGod()
      Get the god assigned to this player
      Returns:
      the god object

    • getWorkers

      public java.util.List<UIWorker> getWorkers()
      Get all this player's workers in a List.
      Returns:
      a list of workers

    • getWorker

      public UIWorker getWorker​(int id)
      Get a worker from a player.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the worker
      Returns:
      the worker

    • setWorker

      public void setWorker​(UIWorker worker)
      Assign a new worker to this player.
      Parameters:
      worker - a new instance of a worker.

    • removeWorker

      public void removeWorker​(int withId)
      Delete a worker from a player by using the worker id. This will effectively delete a worker from the entire match (such as when the player loses). Only a player can remove a worker.
      Parameters:
      withId - the id of the worker
